text: We facilitate the communication
between healthcare providers
and a lot of the health plans in the U.S.
and that translates into tens of thousands
of systems constantly communicating,

yielding 13 billion plus
interactions every year.
That creates a lot of data points,

and so it's very interesting
for us to use Amazon QuickSight

and Amazon Q in QuickSight
to extract the story
behind all these data points.

Since we've implemented the
solution, we've had hundreds
of users be able to self-serve.

Self-serving leads to getting
answers in seconds instead
of getting answers in multiple days.

Having answers within seconds
allows you to be very dynamic
and very proactive about solving problems

before they escalate into
something noticeable.

Amazon Q in QuickSight
takes this a step further.

By using natural language
to interact with the data,
you're actually democratizing access

to the business intelligence
tool so that you don't have

to be a data analyst
anymore to extract insights.
You can be anyone

and be able to naturally
interact with the tool.
It takes about 15 minutes for any analyst
to go from zero to hero using QuickSight
and Q in QuickSight.
